rationale: 'extremely large' is an intensifier modifying 'industry' (noun), not a risk-adjective.
statement_text: So far more than 600,000 chickens and turkeys have been affected in Minnesota. It’s [the Minnesota poultry industry] an extremely large industry.

rationale: 'affected' is moderate. 'extremely large industry' is an intensifier modifying a neutral noun ('industry').
statement_text: So far more than 600,000 chickens and turkeys have been affected in Minnesota. It’s [the Minnesota poultry industry] an extremely large industry.
